title: Davidâ€™s Military Victories
summary: David defeats surrounding enemies including the Philistines, Moabites, and Edomites. God gives David victory wherever he goes, and he rules with justice and righteousness over all Israel.

faq.question: What does this chapter emphasize about David?
faq.answer: That God gave him victory and that he ruled with justice and fairness.

faq.question: Who did David defeat in this chapter?
faq.answer: Enemies including the Philistines, Moabites, Zobah, Arameans, and Edomites.
